name: 'I Love You' Kufic S
description:
17/20
Kūfic script, in calligraphy, earliest extant Islamic style of handwritten alphabet that was used by early Muslims to record the Qurʾān. This angular, slow-moving, dignified script was also used on tombstones and coins as well as for inscriptions on buildings. In this Project I stardet to design some words by Kufic fonot This Piece word is means 'I Love You'
